614300.name: Fantasy Grounds - Mini-Dungeon #023: The Aura of Profit (5E)
614300.description:
A 5E Mini-Dungeon for 4-6 Characters of Level 1

The Aura of Profit takes place in an underground lair that serves as an alchemical laboratory. Fritz is an alchemist who has an underground laboratory in the poor section of the city. His experiments produce wastes that run into the sewer and enhance the effects of alcohol. Several local innkeepers have seen sales plummet, as their patrons cant hold their liquor anymore. They think that there is something happening underground, where a strange odor has been detected under one of the taverns. They have asked the PCs to investigate.
5E Mini-Dungeons are small adventures for 5th Edition which are setting agnostic and are easily inserted anywhere in your campaign.
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5E Ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Anthony Rush
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5E Compatible ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
